_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six senses and their cause and condi: The eye and its cause and condition
The ear and its cause and condition
The nose and its cause and condition
The tongue and its cause and condition
The body and its cause and condition
The mind and its cause and condition
Understanding [sn35.141:1.11]: There is no return to any state of existence
